titles.title: Thomas M. Hess, Indian Studies 1. Raven sings to Crow Martha Lamont #11 2. Crow sings her song M.Lamont #11 3. Snohomish "fight" song M. Lamont 4. Mink sings his song Edward Sam 5. A Love song E. Sam 6. Ant sings her song E. Sam 7. Love song M. Lamont 8. Love song (in Halkomelem) Levi Lamont 9. Love song Florence Sigo
